text:
The Compilation of Explanations has in Appendix III a log of now 133 questions received that were
categorised as ‘already asked’ including a reference to where they have been already answered.
For convenience purposes hyperlinks have been added:
(a) to the official text of the respective ESRS including the corrigendum published on 18 April
2024 after each ESRS heading in this document (ESRS including Corrigendum);
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 9 of 278
